description:
Define RuntimeConfig schema with validation rules for all Layer dependencies. Replace imperative Layer.mergeAll calls with declarative config-driven runtime assembly. Generate TypeScript errors for missing Layer provisions at build time.

**Rationale:** Runtime assembly is scattered across app entry points. Declarative schema centralizes dependency graphs, enables compile-time validation of Layer completeness, and auto-generates documentation of required environment variables.
